Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring registration for the purchase and possession of etching acid.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring registration for the purchase and possession of etching acid.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring registration for the purchase and possession of etching acid.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring registration for the purchase and possession of etching acid.

Items.Title: Resolution endorsing the Speaker’s decision to have the Council intervene in the rate-making proceeding before the State Public Service Commission filed by Consolidated Edison, in which it is seeking a rate increase.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Endorsing the Speaker’s decision to have the Council intervene in the rate-making proceeding before the State Public Service Commission filed by Consolidated Edison, in which it is seeking a rate increase.

Items.Title: Resolution endorsing the Speaker’s decision to have the Council intervene in the rate-making proceeding before the State Public Service Commission filed by Consolidated Edison, in which it is seeking a rate increase.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Endorsing the Speaker’s decision to have the Council intervene in the rate-making proceeding before the State Public Service Commission filed by Consolidated Edison, in which it is seeking a rate increase.
